greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Smallest positive m such that n*m is a partial sum of primes.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..20000
maple: s:= proc(n) option remember; `if`(n=0, 0, ithprime(n)+s(n-1)) end:
a:= proc(n) option remember; local k; for k
while irem(s(k), n)>0 do od; s(k)/n
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Jun 21 2019
